name: Flappy Bird Gameboy
description:
I just finished making a Flappy Bird gameboy port. It took a lot of hard work. I still see room for improvement though. I'm not the original creator of Flappy Bird, so i can't ask for any money. But i have a tutorial on creating it, and a github repo with the source code:

  • Tutorial: How to make Flappy Bird for Gameboy
  • Source Code: https://github.com/LaroldsJubilantJunkyard/flappy-bird-gameboy
